LanguageData.FZN_DescriptionMealZone: A preset stockpile for storing rottable meals.
LanguageData.FZN_DescriptionMedZone: A preset stockpile for storing all medicine.
LanguageData.FZN_DescriptionMeatZone: A preset stockpile for storing rottable meats.
LanguageData.FZN_DescriptionVegZone: A preset stockpile for storing rottable vegetables.
LanguageData.FZN_DescriptionJoyZone: A preset stockpile for storing all joy consumables.
LanguageData.FZN_DescriptionAnimalZone: A preset stockpile for storing dead animals before being butchered.
LanguageData.FZN_DescriptionRottableZone: A preset stockpile for storing rottable things.
LanguageData.FZN_DescriptionIndoorZone: A preset stockpile for storing resources that need to be indoors.
LanguageData.FZN_DescriptionOutdoorZone: A preset stockpile for storing resources that don't need to be indoors.
LanguageData.FZN_GizmoShadeDesc: Change the shade of this stockpile.
